abstract: What began as a straight news story evolved into a more complicated test of the way news should, and perhaps should not, be made.
snippet: What began as a straight news story evolved into a more complicated test of the way news should, and perhaps should not, be made.
lead_paragraph: Pierre Haski, a co-founder of the French news blog Rue 89, received the first call from the hostage-taker just before noon on Monday.

headline.main: A Hostage-Taker Calls, and a French News Blog Begins Tweeting
